markets.title: Will Novak Djokovic announce their retirement in 2025?
markets.yes_sub_title: Before the start of the 2026-27 regular season
markets.no_sub_title: Before the start of the 2026-27 regular season
markets.rules_primary: If Novak Djokovic announces their retirement before January 1, 2026, then the market resolves to Yes.
markets.rules_secondary: Note: the retirement must be intended to be effective immediately or prior to the first new season after the announcement. This market applies to retiring from the league, not the sport as a whole.
markets.early_close_condition: This market will close and expire early if the event occurs.
